description: If you live in the USA Free charts available... Sadly not for the UK.

As far as I can determine, this level does not support oeSENC. At least I can't find a way, after 2 days of searches, to get the plug-in to install on this lower level. The Software Center should be updated with this later and fully supported level of OPENCPN.
Tried to get it to work for a couple of hours, but it never did. Probably needs something obscure to make it work. Good luck finding it.
summary: not great, would not even display the base map

description: OpenCPN is a wonderful chart plotter program. I used it extensively on my laptop and cell phone. I tried this SNAP and I hate it because I have my charts stored on it's own HDD in my system and after hours of trying I couldn't ever get this SNAP to see it becuase it's not built with removable-media plug. I ended up removing this SNAP and installing the PPA. SNAP IS NOT ALWAYS THE ANSWER!
summary: I love OpenCPN but as a SNAP it sucks!

description: ... and it seems to be maintained upstream. This version has some 20 plugins including oesenc availablle from within the application which is what I use being non-US.
Linux version has fataly crashed once but i am running a lot of charts and waypoints.
summary: 5.8.0 with OSenc is fast and fantastic on Fedora 37

description: was real easy to add satelite overlays to the areas we were planning to anchor at
I may have a corrupt config. Using mbtiles feature and heavily adding saftey waypoints. Before the flatpak fails a crash, there is no
summary: 5.8.2-1 draws route right accoss the page

description: An sich ist das Programm super nur leider funktioniert die aktuelle Version für Ubuntu (20.04.1 LTS) nicht :/

summary: Karten werden nicht angezeigt.. Aber eine "Mann über Bord Warnung"

description:
Das GUI ist etwas gewöhnungsbedürftig, man findet aber letztlich alles. 

Durch die Plugins weiterer Autoren viele viele Zusatzfunktionen und inzwischen als eines der wenigen Navi-Systeme auf freien Rechnern offiziel als elektronisches Seekartendisplay zugelassen.

Läuft stabil und schnell auf meinem Android-Handy, meinem Linux-Laptop und meinem Windos-Navi-Tablet. 

Überall alles gleich konfiguriert. Egal was ausfällt, es geht immer weiter.
summary: Kann schon extrem viel und wird immer besser

description: no lo consigo de ninguna de las maneras posibles, ni por lineas de comandos ni por GUIS ni por nada.
summary: version 5.0 no arranca en linux ubuntu 20.04

description: Pas foufifou hein, ca galere pas mal quand meme votre machin la hein
